TopicTitle: Lag/Fps drop in a non-Sun SOI at interstellar distances

Articles.Content:
When entering another SOI at interstellar distances (for excample 4 trillion km), the game freezes if I am timewarping. Also, when timewarping inside a non-Sun SOI at a similar distance with a factor of above 100, the FPS drops to 1-2 and time becomes ca. 5 times slower than it should be.

How to reproduce.

1. Download a mod that adds other stars at such distances (i. e. Real Exoplanets)

2. Go to a star that the mod adds (I recommend installing a mod that adds parts for interstellar travel, as I am unsure if these also occur with Set Orbit/Set Position)

Logs: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/19WDNBHXBro79TebCEl48skm7oXaNaPa4?usp=sharing
